metadata.feature_description: Import and export wiki articles for backup or migration

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify Import/Export Content feature accessibility via Module Actions

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and navigated to Wiki Test page
steps.expected: Wiki Test page loads with Wiki module visible
steps.actual: Wiki Test page loaded successfully with Wiki modules present

steps.action: Enabled Edit mode to access module actions
steps.expected: Edit mode enabled showing Wiki module with 6 articles
steps.actual: Edit mode enabled, Wiki module visible with 6 articles and module action controls

steps.action: Clicked on Admin menu for Wiki module (Module ID 473)
steps.expected: Admin menu should show 'Import/Export Content' option as stated in UI Location
steps.actual: Admin menu showed only: Settings, Help, Develop, Delete, Refresh. NO Import/Export Content option present

steps.action: Clicked on Edit menu for Wiki module
steps.expected: Edit menu might contain Import/Export option
steps.actual: Edit menu showed only 'Add Companion Modules...' option. NO Import/Export Content option present

issues: The 'Import/Export Content' feature described in the UI Location ('Module Actions > Import/Export Content') does not exist in the Wiki module's module actions menu
Code review confirmed the Wiki module does NOT implement the IPortable interface which would provide standard DNN Import/Export module actions
The Wiki.dnn manifest only lists 'Upgradable' and 'Searchable' as supported features, not 'Portable'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify DNN site-level Import/Export as alternative

steps.expected: DNN site-level Import/Export panel should be accessible
steps.actual: Import/Export panel opened showing site-level export/import functionality

steps.action: Clicked Export Data to view export options
steps.expected: Export options should show what content can be exported
steps.actual: Export options showed: Content, Assets, Users, Roles and Groups, Vocabularies, Page Templates, Profile Properties, Permissions, Extensions, Content Library. Wiki content would be included as part of 'Content' export

issues: This is a site-level export, not a Wiki-specific article import/export feature as described in the feature requirements

observations: Code review of ContentExchangeController.cs shows it handles internal content exchange between groups/modules within DNN (moving content), NOT file-based import/export
The BusinessController.cs implements IUpgradeable and ModuleSearchBase but NOT IPortable, which is required for standard DNN module-level Import/Export
The Wiki.dnn manifest confirms supportedFeatures only include 'Upgradable' and 'Searchable', NOT 'Portable'

DNN's site-level Import/Export (PersonaBar > Settings > Import/Export) can export wiki content as part of the entire site export, but this is not a Wiki-specific feature for exporting individual articles
The feature description mentions 'Module Actions > Import/Export Content' which would require implementing IPortable interface - this has not been implemented in the Wiki module
